content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON environment: low volatility (Vol: 22.6%) and full breadth (8/8 sectors positive). Market is a broad bull with participation across cyclical and defensive names.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking ABOVE TREND: HALKB (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +20.84%), VAKBN (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +31.93%), AKBNK (1W: +5.78% | 1M: +20.11%). Technology ABOVE TREND: TCELL (1W: +9.62% | 1M: +20.83%), KONTR (1W: +11.38% | 1M: +8.51%).

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Transportation ABOVE TREND but the weakest weekly lift: TAVHL (1W: +0.91% | 1M: +12.53%), PGSUS (1W: +5.36% | 1M: +9.54%), THYAO (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +20.85%). Construction & REIT ABOVE TREND shows smaller upside versus leaders: ALARK (1W: +2.34% | 1M: +8.59%), ENKAI (quant leader) (1W: +? | 1M: +?).

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
TRALT (1W: +14.56% | 1M: +17.00%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +20.84%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +31.93%) ABOVE TREND, SASA (1W: +11.57% | 1M: +15.38%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +11.50% | 1M: +23.68%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
TUPRS (1W: -0.63% | 1M: +1.37%) CORRECTION, TAVHL (1W: +0.91% | 1M: +12.53%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +1.93% | 1M: +16.09%) ABOVE TREND, ALARK (1W: +2.34% | 1M: +8.59%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +3.59% | 1M: +13.29%) ABOVE TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Highest 1W movers: TRALT (1W: +14.56% | 1M: +17.00%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +20.84%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +31.93%) ABOVE TREND, SASA (1W: +11.57% | 1M: +15.38%) ABOVE TREND, KONTR (1W: +11.38% | 1M: +8.51%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is leading and confirming the move: ISCTR (1W: +8.61% | 1M: +25.60%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +5.78% | 1M: +20.11%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +3.88% | 1M: +11.28%) ABOVE TREND; favor high-beta names HALKB and VAKBN for continued catch-up.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry is constructive: FROTO (1W: +11.50% | 1M: +23.68%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +18.88%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +1.93% | 1M: +16.09%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +4.95% | 1M: -0.08%) RECOVERY â€” watch ASELS for short-term bounce confirmation.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy is broadly bid but with dispersion: TRALT (1W: +14.56% | 1M: +17.00%) ABOVE TREND, SASA (1W: +11.57% | 1M: +15.38%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.71% | 1M: +17.24%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: -0.63% | 1M: +1.37%) CORRECTION; prefer specialty chemicals and select refiner trades only on reversion tests.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-ON stance: overweight Banking, select Tech and cyclical Industrials (FROTO, TOASO), and high-quant Retail names; trim unconfirmed Energy laggards like TUPRS and take profits where 1W >> 1M momentum has run (re-balance into names with more room). Maintain stop discipline for momentum names and size positions for potential mean-reversion.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
VAKBN (1W: +13.27% | 1M: +31.93%) ABOVE TREND for momentum and flow, TRALT (1W: +14.56% | 1M: +17.00%) ABOVE TREND for sector leadership, FROTO (1W: +11.50% | 1M: +23.68%) ABOVE TREND for cyclicals, TCELL (1W: +9.62% | 1M: +20.83%) ABOVE TREND for tech-driven upside.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking (continued leadership and liquidity), Energy & Chemicals (watch dispersion and TUPRS correction), Technology (follow earnings/flows into TCELL and KONTR).

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 for continuation vs a 3-5% pullback as the first risk signal; key catalysts are CBRT comments, domestic CPI prints, foreign fund flows and commodity/energy price moves. Watch earnings updates and quant signals (ENKAI, GUBRF) for re-allocation triggers.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low volatility RISK-ON market with unanimous sector breadth and clear leadership in Banking, Tech and selective Energy/chemicals. Trade overweight cyclical and high-quant retail/banking names while respecting stretched momentum and TUPRS as a near-term caution.
